project_name.justification: The text states: '...it has acquired by staking a 100% interest in the New Hope porphyry copper exploration project in Arizona, USA...'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'Almadex Minerals Ltd. ("Almadex" or the "Company") (TSX-V: “DEX”)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The text identifies the CEO of the buyer: 'Morgan J. Poliquin, PhD, PEng, the President and CEO of Almadex...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states Almadex 'has acquired by staking a 100% interest in the New Hope porphyry copper exploration project'.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as the 'New Hope porphyry copper exploration project'.

verified_article_link.justification: No specific article URL was provided in the source text to verify.

currency.justification: The company is listed on the Canadian TSX Venture Exchange and mentions its cash position in Canadian dollars: 'Our CAD$18 Million cash position as of Q1 2023...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired 'by staking', which does not involve a cash payment. No cash consideration was mentioned in the text.

share_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired 'by staking', which does not involve a share payment. No share consideration was mentioned in the text.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The project was acquired 'by staking'. No combined cash and share payment was mentioned in the text.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The project was acquired 'by staking'. No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The project was acquired 'by staking'. No shares were issued, so there is no associated share price for the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans but does not state a specific drilling commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans but does not state a specific monetary commitment for exploration.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) as part of the acquisition terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: 'The 950 hectare New Hope project...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: 'The 950 hectare New Hope project...'

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a quantified statement of mineral resources with mass or volume units (e.g., tonnes, ounces). It only mentions 'weak copper mineralisation'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text explicitly states the buyer's ticker and exchange: 'Almadex Minerals Ltd. ("Almadex" or the "Company") (TSX-V: “DEX”)'.
